verses.text: Some \w time|strong="H6440"\w* \w later|strong="H1961"\w*, Absalom \w provided|strong="H6213"\w* \w for|strong="H6213"\w* \w himself|strong="H6213"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w chariot|strong="H4818"\w* \w with|strong="H6213"\w* \w horses|strong="H5483"\w* \w and|strong="H2572"\w* \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w* \w men|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w run|strong="H7323"\w* \w ahead|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w*.

\w He|strong="H3605"\w* \w would|strong="H3478"\w* \w get|strong="H3027"\w* \w up|strong="H5975"\w* \w early|strong="H7925"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w stand|strong="H5975"\w* \w beside|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w road|strong="H1870"\w* leading \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w gate|strong="H8179"\w*. \w Whenever|strong="H3605"\w* \w anyone|strong="H3605"\w* \w had|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* grievance \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w bring|strong="H1961"\w* \w before|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w decision|strong="H4941"\w*, Absalom \w would|strong="H3478"\w* \w call|strong="H7121"\w* \w out|strong="H5921"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w ask|strong="H4428"\w*, “\w What|strong="H2088"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w are|strong="H3478"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w*?” \w And|strong="H3478"\w* \w if|strong="H1961"\w* \w he|strong="H3605"\w* replied, “\w Your|strong="H3605"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w is|strong="H2088"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w one|strong="H2088"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w tribes|strong="H7626"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*,”

Absalom \w would|strong="H1697"\w* \w say|strong="H1697"\w*, “\w Look|strong="H7200"\w*, \w your|strong="H7200"\w* \w claims|strong="H1697"\w* \w are|strong="H1697"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w right|strong="H5228"\w*, \w but|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w has|strong="H4428"\w* \w no|strong="H7200"\w* deputy \w to|strong="H8085"\w* \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* \w you|strong="H7200"\w*.”

\w And|strong="H4941"\w* \w he|strong="H3605"\w* \w would|strong="H4310"\w* add, “\w If|strong="H1961"\w* \w only|strong="H3605"\w* \w someone|strong="H4310"\w* \w would|strong="H4310"\w* \w appoint|strong="H7760"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w judge|strong="H8199"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* land, \w then|strong="H1961"\w* \w everyone|strong="H3605"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* grievance \w or|strong="H7379"\w* \w dispute|strong="H7379"\w* \w could|strong="H4310"\w* \w come|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H4941"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w would|strong="H4310"\w* \w give|strong="H7760"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w justice|strong="H4941"\w*.”

\w Also|strong="H3027"\w*, \w when|strong="H1961"\w* anyone \w approached|strong="H7126"\w* \w to|strong="H7971"\w* \w bow|strong="H7812"\w* \w down|strong="H7812"\w* \w to|strong="H7971"\w* \w him|strong="H7971"\w*, Absalom would \w reach|strong="H1961"\w* \w out|strong="H7971"\w* \w his|strong="H7971"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, \w take|strong="H2388"\w* \w hold|strong="H2388"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w him|strong="H7971"\w*, \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w kiss|strong="H5401"\w* \w him|strong="H7971"\w*.

Absalom \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w came|strong="H3478"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w for|strong="H6213"\w* \w justice|strong="H4941"\w*. \w In|strong="H3478"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w way|strong="H1697"\w* \w he|strong="H6213"\w* \w stole|strong="H1589"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w hearts|strong="H3820"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w men|strong="H6213"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

\w After|strong="H7093"\w* four \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w passed|strong="H3068"\w*, Absalom said \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, “\w Please|strong="H4994"\w* \w let|strong="H4994"\w* \w me|strong="H4994"\w* \w go|strong="H3212"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w Hebron|strong="H2275"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w fulfill|strong="H7999"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w vow|strong="H5088"\w* \w I|strong="H8141"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w made|strong="H5087"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w made|strong="H5087"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w vow|strong="H5088"\w* \w while|strong="H3588"\w* \w dwelling|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w Geshur|strong="H1650"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Aram, saying: ‘\w If|strong="H3588"\w* \w indeed|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* brings \w me|strong="H7725"\w* \w back|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w worship|strong="H5647"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* Hebron.’”

“\w Go|strong="H3212"\w* \w in|strong="H4428"\w* \w peace|strong="H7965"\w*,” said \w the|strong="H6965"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*. \w So|strong="H6965"\w* Absalom \w got|strong="H6965"\w* \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w went|strong="H3212"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w Hebron|strong="H2275"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H7971"\w* Absalom \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w spies|strong="H7270"\w* \w throughout|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w tribes|strong="H7626"\w* \w of|strong="H7626"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w with|strong="H8085"\w* \w this|strong="H8085"\w* message: “\w When|strong="H8085"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w sound|strong="H6963"\w* \w of|strong="H7626"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w horn|strong="H7782"\w*, \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w are|strong="H3478"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w say|strong="H6963"\w*, ‘Absalom \w reigns|strong="H4427"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w Hebron|strong="H2275"\w*!’”

\w Two|strong="H1980"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w men|strong="H1980"\w* \w from|strong="H1980"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* accompanied Absalom. \w They|strong="H3808"\w* \w had|strong="H3045"\w* \w been|strong="H3808"\w* \w invited|strong="H7121"\w* \w as|strong="H1697"\w* \w guests|strong="H7121"\w* \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w went|strong="H1980"\w* \w along|strong="H1980"\w* \w innocently|strong="H8537"\w*, \w for|strong="H7121"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w knew|strong="H3045"\w* \w nothing|strong="H3808"\w* \w about|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w matter|strong="H1697"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w messenger|strong="H5046"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w reported|strong="H5046"\w*, “\w The|strong="H5046"\w* \w hearts|strong="H3820"\w* \w of|strong="H3820"\w* \w the|strong="H5046"\w* \w men|strong="H3478"\w* \w of|strong="H3820"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w are|strong="H3478"\w* \w with|strong="H1732"\w* Absalom.”

\w And|strong="H6965"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w said|strong="H6310"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, “\w Arise|strong="H6965"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w let|strong="H3808"\w* \w us|strong="H5921"\w* \w flee|strong="H1272"\w*, \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w escape|strong="H6413"\w* \w from|strong="H6440"\w* Absalom! \w We|strong="H3588"\w* \w must|strong="H3808"\w* leave \w quickly|strong="H4116"\w*, \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w soon|strong="H4116"\w* \w overtake|strong="H5381"\w* \w us|strong="H5921"\w*, heap \w disaster|strong="H7451"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w us|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w put|strong="H5381"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*.”

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*’s \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* replied, “\w Whatever|strong="H3605"\w* \w our|strong="H3605"\w* lord \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* decides, \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w are|strong="H5650"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*.”

\w Then|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w set|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w entire|strong="H3605"\w* \w household|strong="H1004"\w* \w followed|strong="H7272"\w* \w him|strong="H3318"\w*. \w But|strong="H5800"\w* \w he|strong="H3605"\w* \w left|strong="H5800"\w* \w behind|strong="H5800"\w* \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w concubines|strong="H6370"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w take|strong="H8104"\w* \w care|strong="H8104"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w palace|strong="H1004"\w*.

\w So|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w set|strong="H5975"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w with|strong="H3318"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w following|strong="H7272"\w* \w him|strong="H3318"\w*. \w He|strong="H3605"\w* \w stopped|strong="H5975"\w* \w at|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w last|strong="H5975"\w* house,

\w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* marched \w past|strong="H5674"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w*—\w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Cherethites|strong="H3774"\w* \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w Pelethites|strong="H6432"\w*, \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w Gittites|strong="H1663"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w had|strong="H4428"\w* \w followed|strong="H7272"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w* \w from|strong="H6440"\w* \w Gath|strong="H1661"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H1571"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* said \w to|strong="H7725"\w* Ittai \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Gittite|strong="H1663"\w*, “\w Why|strong="H4100"\w* \w should|strong="H4100"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w also|strong="H1571"\w* \w go|strong="H3212"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w us|strong="H7725"\w*? \w Go|strong="H3212"\w* \w back|strong="H7725"\w* \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w stay|strong="H3427"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* new \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, \w since|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H4100"\w* \w both|strong="H1571"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w foreigner|strong="H5237"\w* \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w an|strong="H3588"\w* \w exile|strong="H1540"\w* \w from|strong="H7725"\w* \w your|strong="H7725"\w* homeland.

\w In|strong="H5921"\w* fact, \w you|strong="H5921"\w* arrived only \w yesterday|strong="H8543"\w*; \w should|strong="H1980"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w make|strong="H7725"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w wander|strong="H5128"\w* \w around|strong="H5921"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w us|strong="H7725"\w* \w today|strong="H3117"\w* \w while|strong="H3117"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* do \w not|strong="H7725"\w* know \w where|strong="H5921"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w am|strong="H1980"\w* \w going|strong="H1980"\w*? \w Go|strong="H1980"\w* \w back|strong="H7725"\w* \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w take|strong="H7725"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* brothers \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w*. \w May|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w show|strong="H5973"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* loving \w devotion|strong="H2617"\w* \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w faithfulness|strong="H2617"\w*.”

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* Ittai \w answered|strong="H6030"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, “\w As|strong="H1961"\w* \w surely|strong="H3588"\w* \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w lives|strong="H2416"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w lives|strong="H2416"\w*, \w wherever|strong="H4725"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w may|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w*, whether \w it|strong="H3588"\w* means \w life|strong="H2416"\w* \w or|strong="H4194"\w* \w death|strong="H4194"\w*, \w there|strong="H8033"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w*!”

“\w March|strong="H3212"\w* \w on|strong="H5674"\w* \w then|strong="H5674"\w*,” said \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* Ittai. \w So|strong="H5674"\w* Ittai \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Gittite|strong="H1663"\w* marched \w past|strong="H5674"\w* \w with|strong="H3212"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w men|strong="H3605"\w* \w and|strong="H3212"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w little|strong="H2945"\w* \w ones|strong="H2945"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w were|strong="H1732"\w* \w with|strong="H3212"\w* \w him|strong="H3605"\w*.

\w Everyone|strong="H3605"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w countryside|strong="H3605"\w* \w was|strong="H4428"\w* \w weeping|strong="H1058"\w* \w loudly|strong="H6963"\w* \w as|strong="H5971"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w passed|strong="H5674"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w*. \w And|strong="H4428"\w* \w as|strong="H5971"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w crossed|strong="H5674"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Kidron|strong="H6939"\w* \w Valley|strong="H5158"\w*, \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w also|strong="H4428"\w* \w passed|strong="H5674"\w* \w toward|strong="H1870"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*.
